mapper.select: select * from crew where u_no=#{u_no} order by c_no desc
select c.* from crew c, crew_like l where c.c_no = l.c_no and l.u_no =#{u_no} and not c.u_no=#{u_no}
select c.* from crew_entry e, (select * from crew where sysdate < c_sdate) c where e.c_no = c.c_no and e.u_no = #{u_no} and not c.u_no=#{u_no}
select * from crew where u_no = #{u_no} and c_expose = 'N'
select * from crew where u_no = #{u_no} and sysdate >= c_apply_sdate and sysdate <= c_apply_edate
select * from crew where u_no = #{u_no} and sysdate > c_apply_edate and sysdate < c_sdate
